ygData.subject: Re: Questions about FEAR PLANE....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From a  role playing standpoint that is true.  In this case, just be glad few people role play.  Otherwise more would be mocking Cazic.  :)  I myself am
ygData.messageBody:
>If I were a worshipper of Cazic Thule I would be highly embarassed, and
>never admit it to anyone. Maybe switch and just start worshipping an NPC
>fish peddler in town instead, at least they don't die all the time.
>
>Roop


From a role playing standpoint that is true. In this case, just be glad
few people role play. Otherwise more would be mocking Cazic. :) I myself
am glad I chose agnostic. lol My bard doesn't care if this Cazic is dead,
as he never really cared before. he he he
-Sprite
